entry.title: CTV activation meeting #1 Notes
entry.summary: The recent IRC meeting held on December 18, 2025, in the ctv-csfs-activation channel focused on discussing the activation parameters for BIP 119. Participants reached a consensus on employing BIP 9, opting for conservative parameters to guide its implementation. For those interested in reviewing the activation parameters and notes more thoroughly, they are available at [https://ctv-activation.github.io/](https://ctv-activation.github.io/). The discussion underscores the community's collaborative approach towards decision-making on significant protocol enhancements. Feedback is sought from members who may hold differing opinions on the chosen parameters or preferable timelines, emphasizing the open and inclusive nature of the development process. This initiative reflects the ongoing commitment within the Bitcoin development community to refine and improve the network in a manner that is both cautious and consensus-driven.
